channel.title: watchkit on Fresh Swift
channel.description: Recent content in watchkit on Fresh Swift

item.title: Building a silly WatchKit App
item.description: Erica Sadun with a short post describing her efforts to build a simple WatchKit app using SwiftUI. The amount of code required to implement her app was small, about 40 lines, but Erica encountered some problems when trying to deploy her app to hardware for testing.
